32 namespace TiledArray {
33 namespace detail {

41 template <typename Tile, typename Op>
42 class LazyArrayTile {
43  public:
44  typedef LazyArrayTile<Tile, Op> LazyArrayTile_;
45  typedef Op op_type;
46  typedef typename op_type::result_type eval_type;
47  typedef Tile tile_type;
48 
49  private:
50  mutable tile_type tile_;
51  std::shared_ptr<op_type>
52  op_;
53  bool consume_;
54 
55  template <typename T>
56  using eval_t = typename eval_trait<typename std::decay<T>::type>::type;
57 
58  using conversion_result_type = decltype(
59  ((!Op::is_consumable) && consume_ ? op_->consume(tile_)
60  : (*op_)(tile_)));
61 
62 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
63  // TODO need a better design on how to manage the lifetime of converted Tile
64  mutable conversion_result_type conversion_tile_;
65 #endif
66  public:
68  LazyArrayTile()
69  : tile_(),
70  op_(),
71  consume_(false)
72 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
73  ,
74  conversion_tile_()
75 #endif
76  {
77  }
78 
80 
82  LazyArrayTile(const LazyArrayTile_& other)
83  : tile_(other.tile_),
84  op_(other.op_),
85  consume_(other.consume_)
86 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
87  ,
88  conversion_tile_()
89 #endif
90  {
91  }
92 
94 
98  LazyArrayTile(const tile_type& tile, const std::shared_ptr<op_type>& op,
99  const bool consume)
100  : tile_(tile),
101  op_(op),
102  consume_(consume)
103 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
104  ,
105  conversion_tile_()
106 #endif
107  {
108  }
109 
111 
113  LazyArrayTile_& operator=(const LazyArrayTile_& other) {
114  tile_ = other.tile_;
115  op_ = other.op_;
116  consume_ = other.consume_;
117 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
118  conversion_tile_ = other.conversion_tile_;
119 #endif
120  return *this;
121  }
122 
124 
126  bool is_consumable() const { return consume_ || op_->permutation(); }
127 
129 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
130 
131  explicit operator conversion_result_type&() const {
132  conversion_tile_ =
133  std::move(((!Op::is_consumable) && consume_ ? op_->consume(tile_)
134  : (*op_)(tile_)));
135  return conversion_tile_;
136  }
137 
138 #else
139  explicit operator conversion_result_type() const {
140  return ((!Op::is_consumable) && consume_ ? op_->consume(tile_)
141  : (*op_)(tile_));
142  }
143 #endif
144 
146  const tile_type& tile() const { return tile_; }
147 
149 
151  template <typename Archive>
152  void serialize(const Archive&) {
153  TA_ASSERT(false);
154  }
155 
156 }; // LazyArrayTile
157 
159 
169 template <typename Array, typename Op, typename Policy>
170 class ArrayEvalImpl
171  : public DistEvalImpl<LazyArrayTile<typename Array::value_type, Op>,
172  Policy>,
173  public std::enable_shared_from_this<ArrayEvalImpl<Array, Op, Policy> > {
174  public:
175  typedef ArrayEvalImpl<Array, Op, Policy>
176  ArrayEvalImpl_;
177  typedef DistEvalImpl<LazyArrayTile<typename Array::value_type, Op>, Policy>
178  DistEvalImpl_;
179  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::TensorImpl_
180  TensorImpl_;
181  typedef Array array_type;
182  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::size_type size_type;
183  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::range_type range_type;
184  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::shape_type shape_type;
185  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::pmap_interface
186  pmap_interface;
187  typedef
188  typename DistEvalImpl_::trange_type trange_type;
189  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::value_type
190  value_type;
191  typedef Op op_type;
192 
193  using std::enable_shared_from_this<
194  ArrayEvalImpl<Array, Op, Policy> >::shared_from_this;
195 
196  private:
197  array_type array_;
198  std::shared_ptr<op_type> op_;
199  BlockRange block_range_;
200 
201  public:
203 
211  ArrayEvalImpl(const array_type& array, World& world,
212  const trange_type& trange, const shape_type& shape,
213  const std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface>& pmap,
214  const Permutation& perm, const op_type& op)
215  : DistEvalImpl_(world, trange, shape, pmap, perm),
216  array_(array),
217  op_(std::make_shared<op_type>(op)),
218  block_range_() {}
219 
221 
231  ArrayEvalImpl(const array_type& array, World& world,
232  const trange_type& trange, const shape_type& shape,
233  const std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface>& pmap,
234  const Permutation& perm, const op_type& op,
235  const std::vector<std::size_t>& lower_bound,
236  const std::vector<std::size_t>& upper_bound)
237  : DistEvalImpl_(world, trange, shape, pmap, perm),
238  array_(array),
239  op_(std::make_shared<op_type>(op)),
240  block_range_(array.trange().tiles_range(), lower_bound, upper_bound) {}
241 
243  virtual ~ArrayEvalImpl() {}
244 
245  virtual Future<value_type> get_tile(size_type i) const {
246  // Get the array index that corresponds to the target index
247  size_type array_index = DistEvalImpl_::perm_index_to_source(i);
248 
249  // If this object only uses a sub-block of the array, shift the tile
250  // index to the correct location.
251  if (block_range_.rank()) array_index = block_range_.ordinal(array_index);
252 
253  // Get the tile from array_, which may be located on a remote node.
254  Future<typename array_type::value_type> tile = array_.find(array_index);
255 
256  const bool consumable_tile = !array_.is_local(array_index);
257 
258  return eval_tile(tile, consumable_tile);
259  }
260 
262 
265  virtual void discard_tile(size_type) const {
266  const_cast<ArrayEvalImpl_*>(this)->notify();
267  }
268 
269  private:
270  value_type make_tile(const typename array_type::value_type& tile,
271  const bool consume) const {
272  return value_type(tile, op_, consume);
273  }
274 
276  madness::Future<value_type> eval_tile(
277  const madness::Future<typename array_type::value_type>& tile,
278  const bool consumable_tile) const {
279  // Insert the tile into this evaluator for subsequent processing
280  if (tile.probe()) {
281  // Skip the task since the tile is ready
282  Future<value_type> result;
283  result.set(make_tile(tile, consumable_tile));
284  const_cast<ArrayEvalImpl_*>(this)->notify();
285  return result;
286  } else {
287  // Spawn a task to set the tile when the input tile is not ready.
288  Future<value_type> result = TensorImpl_::world().taskq.add(
289  shared_from_this(), &ArrayEvalImpl_::make_tile, tile, consumable_tile,
290  madness::TaskAttributes::hipri());
291  result.register_callback(const_cast<ArrayEvalImpl_*>(this));
292  return result;
293  }
294  }
296 
300  virtual int internal_eval() {
301  // Counter for the number of tasks submitted by this object
302  int task_count = 0;
303 
304  // Get a count of the number of local tiles.
305  if (TensorImpl_::shape().is_dense()) {
306  task_count = TensorImpl_::pmap()->local_size();
307  } else {
308  // Create iterator to tiles that are local for this evaluator.
309  typename array_type::pmap_interface::const_iterator it =
310  TensorImpl_::pmap()->begin();
311  const typename array_type::pmap_interface::const_iterator end =
312  TensorImpl_::pmap()->end();
313 
314  for (; it != end; ++it) {
315  if (!TensorImpl_::is_zero(*it)) ++task_count;
316  }
317  }
318 
319  return task_count;
320  }
321 
322 }; // class ArrayEvalImpl
323 
324 } // namespace detail
325 } // namespace TiledArray
